it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms

Interface AtomEffectContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EffectContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomContext, MockAtomEffectContext, PowerUpAtom, ReloadAtom, RevengeAtom, ShootAtom

    public interface AtomEffectContext
extends EffectContext
    Atoms implementing this iterface may be used as an EffectContext aware of thier caller and all other information necessary to an effect's resolution

    • Method Summary

      Inform this context of the weapon containing the effect.
